name: Arlo: Chapter1
description:
ARLO: CHAPTER 1

So this is my first game I have ever uploaded on itch.io.. This game is about an army man who is here in this wasteland to know more about Viktor but finds an army of his. At the last, a rocket man (Viktor's Right hand man) You have to kill him. 

I am working on another chapter of this so plz support by downloading this, commenting and following me.

Controls:

W or Up arrow key: move forward

S or Down arrow key: Move backward

A or Left arrow key: Move left

D or Right arrow key: Move right

E: Equip

F: Flash Light

C: Crouch

Left mouse button: Shoot

Right mouse button: Zoom

Thank You!!
